QuestData.Title: Defending the Vault
QuestData.Description:
To reach the vault, we'll need to carve a path through the attacking Mawsworn.
The covenants are doing their best to drive off these monstrosities, but our allies can't hold out forever. The Mawsworn are intent on reaching the prize before you.
We could use your help fighting against the Jailer's forces, Maw Walker.
Purpose guide us all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Protector Kah-Rev defeat the invading Mawsworn.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Secutor Mevix within the Vault of Secrets.
QuestData.RewardText:
Good work fighting those Mawsworn.
We'll take it from here, $n.
